q: , Google co-founder Larry Page will replace Eric Schmidt and take over as Chief Executive Officer in April. Mr Eric Schmidt , who became CEO in 2001, will assume the role of Executive Chairman, focusing externally on deals, partnerships, customers and broader business relationships, government outreach and technology thought leadership , according to the official Google blog spot. Mr Eric Schmidt would continue to act as an advisor to Mr Page and co-founder Mr Sergey Brin .`` Page will take charge of Google's day-to-day operations

SAN FRANCISCO( Reuters)- Chrysler Group LLC's chief executive apologized on Saturday for describing the high-interest bailout loans extended by the U.S. and Canadian governments in 2009 as`` shyster loans.'' Yesterday, in responding to a question... SAN FRANCISCO( Reuters)- Chrysler Group LLC's chief executive apologized on Saturday for describing the high-interest bailout loans extended by the U.S. and Canadian governments in 2009 as`` shyster loans. `` Yesterday, in responding to a question about Chrysler's government loans, I used a term in reference to the interest rate being charged on our government loans that has raised concern,'' CEO Sergio Marchionne
